PositionHistory.Title: Data Science Intern
PositionHistory.Description: Exploratory Data Analysis Using SEABORN and MatPlotLib libraries * Supervised Machine Learning: Regression and Classification * Unsupervised Machine Learning * Ensemble Techniques * Case Study * MySQL DBMS handling * Data Visualization using Tableau

PositionHistory.Title: Production Executive
PositionHistory.Description: Production Executive at the D.B. Fabrication Department - Involved with implementation of Standard Time Study for all standardised products in the Fabrication production line. - Reduced off-cut from 6 ton under the Zero Wastage initiative undertaken as a KPI for the plant. - Achieved a CNQ percentage of 0.15 against a target of 0.20 - Meeting the targets for EMS ISO 15001:2015 and QMS ISO 9001:2015 - Achieved a service level of 93% against a target of 90% for the year 2018-19.

PositionHistory.Title: Student Intern

OrgName.OrganizationName: Productivity Service Department of the Commercial Vehicles Business Unit

PositionHistory.Description: Jamshedpur. Implementation of Maynard's Operation Sequencing Technique, a motion time study, at one of the assembly lines to redefine worker wage rates & improve efficiency.

sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:Description: Shubham Sen's experience appears to be mostly concentrated in Information Technology (mostly Big Data) and slightly concentrated in User Experience (mostly Interactive Design). Shubham Sen's experience appears to be lower-to-mid level, with about 3 years of experience, with several years tenure in management, including a somewhat high-level position.
sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:ManagementStory: Starting on 1/1/2018, the candidate held the following low-level management position for 20 months: Title: Production Executive for IndoAsian, NEDSPL, Legrand Group
sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:AttentionNeeded: ATTENTION: The candidate appears to have been in management in a past role (Production Executive for IndoAsian, NEDSPL, Legrand Group) , but was not in management in the most recent role as Data Science Intern for Practicing Python and PANDAS Library.
